situation.title: Indoor
situation.meta_description: Obligation to cover your mouth and nose needs to be followed within any indoor areas.

content.processed:
Recommendations and Regulations

Obligation to cover your mouth and nose – especially with a face mask, respirator or a scarf – needs to be followed within any indoor areas.

Within the obligation of wearing a face covering in indoor areas, there are some exemptions. The face covering does not need to be worn while being at home or other accommodation areas (e.g. especially hotel rooms). The face covering does not need to be worn by children under the age of 3 or while being with people who live in the same household. This exemption also includes people who cannot wear a face covering because of a serious mental illness or intellectual impairment.

Teachers may use a protective shield instead of a face mask when it is necessary for a pupil to see the teacher`s mouth. In such cases, the 2 meters must be maintained.

It is mandatory to wear a face mask when training indoors, only professional athletes are exempt from this rule.  

Face mask is a very effective protection that helps to prevent the spreading of viral illnesses. Therefore, we recommend wearing your face covering while being in any indoor areas. By doing this, you will protect yourself and others.

It is strongly recommended to use FFP2 (KN95) respirators, which provide more effective protection than surgical or cloth masks

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while being in a hotel room?
questions_answers.value: No. The exemption however only applies to your hotel room, it does not apply to any common areas of the hotel (hallways, the lift, etc.) where the face mask needs to be worn.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while being at work?
Do I need to wear a face mask while visiting any authorities or a post office?
Do I need to wear a face mask while someone's visiting me at home?
questions_answers.value: Accommodation areas are exempt. However, apart from your closest family members, there should be no other visits.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while being at school?
questions_answers.value: Yes, only nurseries and primary schools (1st to 5th grade) are exempt.
